mapper.update:
update device_apps_local
device_sn = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
list_version = #{listVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update device_apps_local set device_sn = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_version = #{listVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into device_apps_local (device_sn, list_version, app_id, create_time, modify_time) values
(#{item.deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.listVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: /* direct(table=device_apps) */ select da.app_id as appId, da.local_icon_file_path as localIconFilePath, da.local_snapshot as localSnapshot, da.local_package_url as localPackageUrl, da.list_version as listVersion, da.version_code as versionCode, da.package_md5 as packageMd5, da.package_name as packageName, da.version_name as versionName from device_apps da left join device_apps_local dal on da.list_version = dal.list_version and da.app_id = dal.app_id where dal.device_sn = #{deviceSn}
